author: Daniel Goodwin
comment: Integrates perfectly with my harmony elite remote hub, and gives me control with my Huawei Watch 2. There aren't many useful apps for a watch, but this is one of them. It finds all your pre-existing activities, and even gives them default control template. I wish the app could run in the background, but that's a very minor complaint. Great app!

author: BrandonF
comment: Works perfectly for me so far. Not some clunky itty bitty remote like I've come to expect. Very handy, very well thought out an all around nice app. I'm extremely pleased.

author: Peter Rietkerk
comment: Great app! And for free?! Perfectly integrates my watch with home system (Logitech hub). Remote always on my wrist. Completely customizable interface, programmable buttons and screens. But also pretty good (default) templates, takes over setup of existing hub seamlessly. Rare!

author: Zach Hillyard
comment: Constantly force closing when I attempt to edit button configuration. App is currently non functional. Please fix.

author: Mike Engel
comment: This is my favorite and most useful Android Wear app.  Pro version worth every penny.

author: John Hume
comment: Very easy to set up and more responsive than trying to access commands through IFTTT.

author: Paul Bean
comment: This app is amazing and so customizable.

author: bo ro
comment: it's great and for free, but can i controle my hue lights from it as well?

author: Shane DeGroat
comment: This app alone is reason enough to wear a smartwatch!

author: Bart Samwel
comment: Very nice! Controls my Harmony Hub like it should, and it's very configurable. One detail is that on my LG G Watch the app closes every time the screen times out, so when I want to press a button I have to open the app again and wait for the connection. That does get old. But it's still much better than opening up my phone.

author: bernie janicki
comment: Awesome. This app has potential to be my primary AV control. Minus one star for the few issues issues with fit and finish on my Sony SW3. My main issue is that the 12 button control surface shows up as only 3 buttons (1 - 3) ?  Likely due to the watch face being square.  Any way to resize the buttons?  Other issues are buttons on top of the activity text on the home screen.  Keep up the good work Tim!

author: ANDREW WALKER
comment: What a great app the function is flawless. Would love one more screen and on my wish list would be some sort of keyboard if that's possible thanks

author: Rick Michaelson
comment: Fantastic. Between this app and Alexa I rarely touch the actual remote. Worth every penny for the PRO version.

author: David Bell
comment: Really smart, and seems to work well
title: Awesome

author: Joost Zilla
comment: Man, this app is so useful. Only thing i hope for are volume buttons straight on my WatchMaker face.
title: Perfect app from a great developer
